param.name: ml_arch_repo
param.label: ML archive repository
param.help: Repo MUST have SSH prefix, e.g. git@github.com:org/repo, for SSH auth w/ deploy keys to push

param.name: whost
param.label: Workflow host (cluster name)
param.help: Name of cluster to run on.

param.name: miniconda_loc
param.label: Location (prefix) of Miniconda installation
param.help: Location of miniconda on cluster. __USER__ is auto substituted.

param.name: my_env
param.label: Name of Miniconda environment
param.help: Specify name of Miniconda environment to use. There is a bug with using base!

param.name: train_test_data
param.label: Data for training and testing [.csv] [Inputs, Outputs]
param.help: The header contains the parameter names; the inputs must occupy the first columns; path wrt ML archive repo.

param.name: predict_data
param.label: Data for predicting [.csv] [Inputs, Outputs]
param.help: The header contains the parameter names; only inputs; path wrt ML data repo.

param.name: superlearner_conf
param.label: SuperLearner configuration
param.help: SuperLearner configuration; path wrt ML code repo

param.name: work_dir_base
param.label: Working directory basename wrt archive repo
param.help: Prefix/base of the location where to store all SL output in the archive repo. Test!

param.name: cross_val_score
param.label: Run cross-validation?
param.help: Select yes to run cross-validation on the entire data set

param.name: smogn
param.label: Use SMOGN to build synthetic data
param.help: Select yes to augment training data with synthetic data.

param.name: onnx
param.label: Save SuperLearner models in ONNX format
param.help: Select yes to save in ONNX format (more portable than .pkl)
